## StoreLogger type

Store的日志记录器

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type StoreLogger = (info: storeLoggerInfo) => void;
```
<b>References:</b> [storeLoggerInfo](./react-web.storeloggerinfo.md)

## Remarks

Store的所有变化都将调用该记录器
